comment: Caramel, butterscotch, vanilla - smooth with just the right amount of heat. Well done!
Buttery, cinnamon, brown sugar and vanilla.  Very smooth.  Solid dram!

Drank neat.  Butterscotch, floral, slight cinnamon spice.  Super smooth at 52%, little to no burn.  This was a pricey bottle but it makes up for it in the taste and smoothness.  I still think there are $40-50 bourbons on par with this one, but this offering does seem slightly more complete.

N:  Mostly buttery, cinnamon, a little bit of brown sugar.
P: same as the nose with cherry at the end.
F:Medium

Solid bourbon from Barrell again.
